trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> N'nagali is looking at you with motherly concern.
TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the rotting logs to N'nagali.
TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Sir)) /var>, if you could hold out your hand? I have something you really must eat. Please, I insist!

TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_001<tab>Is that not the juiciest, sweetest, most invigorating thing you've ever tasted? I just finished baking a batch, and judging by your somewhat wan complexion, I thought you could use a little treat!

TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_002<tab>Oh, don't worry─I know exactly what I'm feeding you. Though I've settled here in this haven of archived cultural treasures, I was once a student of the nutritional sciences at the Faculty of Medicine.

TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_003<tab>The knowledge from that course certainly comes in useful when it comes to keeping my weary colleagues healthy and hale. ...Although I do struggle to find the time to collect all the ingredients I need.

TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_004<tab>In fact, I wonder if you'd be willing to help in that regard? I was about to head out and gather some things east of here, but if you could scour the area to the northwest for a couple of rotting logs, I'd be ever so grateful!
TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_005<tab>Yes, rotting logs! They don't need to be massive, but I will need them intact!
TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_011<tab>Yes! These should be <var 1A 02 /var>riddled<var 1A 01 /var> with the little darlings!

TEXT_AKTKZA009_04188_NNAGALI_000_012<tab>Thank you, both from me, and on behalf of my sure-to-be-appreciative fellow archivists! After all, no dish has more nutritional value than one made with beetle larvae!
